Package com.alticelabs.ccp.exagon.api.protocol_mapper.zombie_session

Interface IExagonSessionValidityHandler

public interface IExagonSessionValidityHandler
An extensible specification used to enrich the ExagonInternalRequest with methods relevant for Exagon's Zombie Session Manager (ZSM).

The ZSM is a module that controls the sessions that no longer have network stimulus. A session whose last external event is older than the parameterized tolerance must be automatically and administratively terminated with an administrative session termination pseudo-event generated in the orchestrator via #createAdministrativeCloseSessionEvent. This way, it is guaranteed that session contexts do not remain in the repository forever and that sessions are functionally closed.

Since:
5.0
